abstract: Mr. Pickens said he was refocusing the plan, not only de-emphasizing wind energy, but also turning his natural gas focus from cars and pickup trucks to big commercial vehicles.
snippet: Mr. Pickens said he was refocusing the plan, not only de-emphasizing wind energy, but also turning his natural gas focus from cars and pickup trucks to big commercial vehicles.
lead_paragraph: From our friends at the Wheels blog:

headline.main: T. Boone Pickens Tweaks His Energy Plan
